pages.text: Subtitle: Vegan's Horror$(br2)Getting food and other resources from animals take a bit of extra work. When you kill a cow, sheep, chicken, pig, llama, or rabbit, you don't get their normal drops. You get a carcass that you then need to process!$(br2)

Once you have a carcass, you can put it straight onto a Roaster placed over a campfire.$(br2)Or you can process the carcass on the ground to get skin or fur plus meat using a cleaver.$(br2)Put the carcass on a meathook for more efficient processing!$(br2)The skin and fur can be processed on a rack with shears.
